title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
OB: The bug report lacks a clear description of the observed behavior.
EB: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., 'org.apache.ant'), I get the following error: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. I'm also unsure about the meaning of this error message.
SR:
1. Open the software application.
2. Navigate to a binary project, for example, 'org.apache.ant'.
3. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy within the project.
